mapper.insert: INSERT INTO JoinedClubList (email, clubName, joinedClubId, accessbility, role) SELECT #{email} as email, c.clubSubject as clubName, c.id as joinedClubId, 0 as accessbility, '' as role FROM clubList c WHERE c.id NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT j.joinedClubId FROM clubList c , JoinedClubList j WHERE c.id = j.joinedClubId and j.email = #{email}) and c.id = #{clubId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM JoinedClubList j WHERE j.email = #{email}
SELECT j.joinedClubId FROM JoinedClubList j WHERE j.email = #{email}
